trans-unit.source: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XSLT 參數或擴充物件引數數目可變。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別由<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: It allows parameters and extension objects to be invoked from within the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓參數和從樣式表中叫用的擴充物件。

trans-unit.source: When the parameters and objects are added to the XsltArgumentList, they are associated with a namespace qualified name and a namespace URI, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 當 XsltArgumentList 加入參數和物件時，它們分別命名空間限定的名稱和命名空間 URI 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following are advantages to passing an object rather than using an embedded script such as `<msxsl:script>`: - Provides better encapsulation and reuse of classes.
trans-unit.target: 以下是傳遞給物件，而不是使用內嵌指令碼，例如優點`<msxsl:script>`:-提供更好的封裝和重複使用的類別。

trans-unit.source: - Allows style sheets to be smaller and more easily maintained.
trans-unit.target: -允許較小且容易維護的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: - Supports passing node fragments (through the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>) to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: -支援將節點片段傳遞 (透過<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>) 樣式表。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the XsltArgumentList, see [XSLT Extension Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [XSLT Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用 XsltArgumentList 的詳細資訊，請參閱[XSLT 擴充物件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[XSLT 參數](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Implements a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new object to the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> and associates it with the namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 將新的物件加入<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>並將它與命名空間 URI 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, is currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: `params`關鍵字，以允許未指定要傳遞的參數數目，目前不支援。

trans-unit.source: XSLT style sheets that utilize methods defined with the `params` keyword does not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 利用定義與方法的 XSLT 樣式表`params`關鍵字無法正常運作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [params](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[params](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to associate with the object.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間與物件相關聯的 URI。

trans-unit.source: To use the default namespace, specify an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的預設命名空間，請指定空字串。

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the list.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The namespaceUri is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform The namespaceUri already has an extension object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: namespaceUri 是或 http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform namespaceUri 已有與其相關聯的延伸模組物件。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有足夠的權限，才能呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds a parameter to the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> and associates it with the namespace qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 新增參數至<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>並將它關聯的命名空間限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `parameter` should correspond to a W3C type.
trans-unit.target: `parameter`應該對應至 W3C 型別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding.NET class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 W3C 型別、 XPath 或 XSLT 和 corresponding.NET 類別。

trans-unit.source: |W3C Type|Equivalent.NET Class (Type)| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |`String` (XPath)|<xref:System.String>| |`Boolean` (XPath)|<xref:System.Boolean>| |`Number` (XPath)|<xref:System.Double>| |`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>| |`Node Set` (XPath)|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>
trans-unit.target: |W3C 型別 |Equivalent.NET 類別 （型別） | |--------------|-----------------------------------| |`String` (XPath) |<xref:System.String>| |`Boolean` (XPath) |<xref:System.Boolean>| |`Number` (XPath) |<xref:System.Double>| |`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>| |`Node Set` (XPath)|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator></xref:System.Double></xref:System.Boolean></xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: `XPathNavigator[]`| |`Node`* (XPath)|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>| *This is equivalent to a node set that contains a single node.
trans-unit.target: `XPathNavigator[]`| |`Node`* (XPath)|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>| *這相當於含有單一節點的節點集。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: If the parameter object being invoked from within the style sheet is not one of the above, it is converted according to the following rules: - CLR numeric types are converted to <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 如果要從樣式表內叫用的參數物件不是上述其中一項，則會轉換根據下列規則:-CLR 數字類型會轉換成<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.DateTime> type is converted to <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>類型會轉換至<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.DateTime> -

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> types are converted to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>型別會轉換至<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: `XPathNavigator[]` is converted to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: `XPathNavigator[]`轉換至<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: All other types throw an error.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他類型都會擲回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The name to associate with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 與參數相關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to associate with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 與參數產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: To use the default namespace, specify an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的預設命名空間，請指定空字串。

trans-unit.source: The parameter value or object to add to the list.
trans-unit.target: 參數的值来加入至清單物件。

trans-unit.source: The namespaceUri is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform.
trans-unit.target: namespaceUri 是或 http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform。

trans-unit.source: The name is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.
trans-unit.target: name 不是有效的名稱，根據 W3C XML 規格。

trans-unit.source: The namespaceUri already has a parameter associated with it.
trans-unit.target: namespaceUri 已經有與其相關聯的參數。

trans-unit.source: Removes all parameters and extension objects from the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有的參數和擴充物件，從<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定的命名空間相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the object.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 物件。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI object or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果其中一個找不到。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameter associated with the namespace qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的命名空間限定名稱的參數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> does not check to ensure the name passed is a valid local name; however, the name cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>不會檢查以確保傳遞的名稱是有效的本機名稱。不過，名稱不能<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 參數相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The parameter object or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 參數物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果其中一個找不到。

trans-unit.source: Removes the object with the namespace URI from the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有命名空間 URI 的物件從<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的物件與關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: The object with the namespace URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 的物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果其中一個找不到。

trans-unit.source: Removes the parameter from the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除從參數<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> does not check to ensure the name passed is a valid local name; however, the name cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref>不會檢查以確保傳遞的名稱是有效的本機名稱。不過，名稱不能<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the parameter to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的 URI 參數的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The parameter object or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 參數物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果其中一個找不到。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the `xsl:message` element.
trans-unit.target: 指定訊息的樣式表中時，就會發生`xsl:message`項目。

trans-unit.source: If the event is not registered, all messages are piped to standard out.
trans-unit.target: 如果未註冊的事件，將所有訊息都傳送至標準輸出。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
